address: Carrer Tallers, 68 and Carrer d’Escudellers Blancs, 3
specials: All drinks (except shots) are half price. Beers from €1.50, mojitos for €3.50, and 1L mojitos ('mojilitro') for €9. Free popcorn with each round.
description: Known for its grunge vibe, skate park, and rock playlist, Nevermind offers a unique underground experience.

specials: Discounted cocktails, shots, gin & tonics, mixed drinks, premium shots, and beers.
description: A rock-themed bar with pinball machines, graffiti, and live music, offering a dynamic and energetic environment.

specials: 50% off sparkling wine bottles, $7 mini espresso martinis, mini dirty martinis, discounted wines, beers, and cocktails. Small plates like Montadito with serrano ham, beef tartare, and Marcona almonds.
description: Barcelona Wine Bar offers a great way to discover new wines and enjoy tasty snacks at discounted prices. It's a social spot perfect for winding down after a long day.
A cozy and welcoming bar with a hot bear theme, popular among locals and tourists. Offers an extensive menu of drinks and a friendly atmosphere.

specials: Homemade xampanet sparkling wine and classic Spanish tapas

A cozy and welcoming bar with a hot bear theme, popular among locals and tourists. Offers an extensive menu of drinks and a friendly atmosphere.
A glamorous cocktail bar inspired by James Bond, offering a vintage atmosphere with expertly crafted classic cocktails.

BierCab is a haven for craft beer enthusiasts, offering a wide selection of local and international brews in a relaxed, modern setting.
A cozy and intimate bar specializing in a wide variety of whiskies and craft cocktails, La Whiskeria provides a perfect setting for a quiet evening drink.
Known for its vibrant and eclectic decor, Milk Bar & Bistro offers a fun and relaxed atmosphere with a great selection of cocktails and delicious tapas.

With a speakeasy vibe and expertly crafted cocktails, Bar Sauvage offers a unique and stylish setting for enjoying happy hour drinks.
Located in the trendy El Born district, La Bona Sort offers a cozy atmosphere with a great selection of wines and delicious tapas, perfect for a relaxed happy hour.

A lively bar in the trendy El Born district, Bar El Born offers a vibrant atmosphere with a great selection of drinks and a popular happy hour.
